p: A final volume of 20 μL containing 2 μL of reverse primer (10 pmol/ μL) (GeNet BioG-2000), 2 μL of forward primer (10 pmol/ μL) (GeNet BioG-2000), 10 μL of 2X Prime Taq Premix (GeNet BioG-2000) which contain Prime Taq DNA Polymerase, reaction buffer, enzyme stabilizer, dNTPs mixture, and loading dye, 1 μL of ddH2O, and 5 μL of DNA template was mixed.
